headline.main: Senior China Government Adviser Criticizes Web Censorship
headline.print_headline: Senior China Government Adviser Criticizes Web Censorship

lead_paragraph: Oscar rules, in films like “Arrival” and “Hacksaw Ridge,” a Lifetime movie starring Viola Davis, and Octavia Spencer in her hosting debut on “Saturday Night Live.”
